label: ASLtbx
name: asl-tbx
description: A gear for ASL analysis using ASLtbx
author: Ze Wang (redhatw@gmail.com)
cite: Ze Wang, Geoffrey Aguirre, Hengyi Rao, JiongJiong Wang, Anna R. Childress, John A. Detre, Empirical ASL data analysis using an ASL data processing toolbox: ASLtbx, Magnetic Resonance Imaging, 2008, 26(2):261-9.

project.description: The name of the project containing the files to be analyzed

tag.description: The tag that identifies the sessions and files to be analyzed

struct_prefix.description: The prefix that all of the T1-weighted anatomical scan nifti file names start with

func_prefix.description: The prefix that all of the 4D functional scan nifti file names start with

delay_time.description: Delay time for labeled spin to enter the imaging slice
